mapper.insert: insert into doctor ( IdNumber, Name, Sex, Age, DepartmentId, Title ) values ( #{idNumber}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{departmentId}, #{title} );
mapper.update: update doctor set IdNumber = #{idNumber}, DepartmentId = #{healthCareType}, Name = #{name}, Sex = #{sex}, Age = #{age}, Title = #{allergy} where DoctorId = #{id}
mapper.select: select PassWord from doctoraccount where Account = #{account}
select * from patient where PatientId in ( select register.PatientId from register where DoctorId = #{d_id} and AppointmentTime <= now() )
